mapper.insert:
insert into examination (paperId, respond, subjectId,score) values
(#{item.paperId}, #{item.respond}, #{item.subjectId},#{item.score})
mapper.select: select e.*,s.*,sk.*,st.* from examination as e left join subject as s on e.subjectId = s .id left join subjectKind as sk on sk.id=s.kindId left join subjectType as st on st.id=s.typeId where e.paperId=#{paperId}
